lead.p: isSafeInteger â€“ Check whether an integer is in the safe range.

example.heading: isSafeInteger example
example.code:
console.log(Number.isSafeInteger(12)); // true console.log(Number.isSafeInteger(12.42)); // false console.log(Number.isSafeInteger(12345678901234567890)); // false
console.log(Number.isSafeInteger('12')); // false console.log(Number.isSafeInteger(NaN)); // false console.log(Number.isSafeInteger(Infinity)); // false
